lead_paragraph: Justine Henin-Hardenne defeated Flavia Pennetta yesterday, 6-4, 7-5, to pull Belgium even with Italy, 1-1, in the best-of-five format after the opening day of the Fed Cup final in Charleroi, Belgium. Reverse singles and doubles are scheduled for today.
